changeSet.sql: update catissue_specimen set collection_status = 'Missed Collection' where collection_status not in ('Collected', 'Pending')

changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.id: Update the Site's default insititute from coordinator
changeSet.sql: update catissue_site site join catissue_site_coordinators siteCrd on siteCrd.site_id = site.identifier join catissue_user usr on usr.identifier = siteCrd.user_id join os_departments dep on dep.identifier = usr.department_id set site.institute_id = dep.institute_id

changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.id: Update the Site's default insititute from coordinator
changeSet.sql: merge into catissue_site site using ( select site.identifier as site_id, dep.institute_id as inst_id from catissue_site site join catissue_site_coordinators siteCrd on siteCrd.site_id = site.identifier join catissue_user usr on usr.identifier = siteCrd.user_id join os_departments dep on dep.identifier = usr.department_id ) t on (site.identifier = t.site_id) when matched then update set site.institute_id = t.inst_id

changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.id: Update the DP's default institute ID from the PI
changeSet.sql: update catissue_distribution_protocol dp join catissue_user u on u.identifier = dp.principal_investigator_id join os_departments dep on dep.identifier = u.department_id join catissue_institution inst on inst.identifier = dep.institute_id set dp.institute_id = inst.identifier

changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.id: Update the DP's default institute ID from the PI
changeSet.sql: merge into catissue_distribution_protocol dp using ( select dp.identifier as dp_id, dep.institute_id as inst_id from catissue_distribution_protocol dp join catissue_user usr on usr.identifier = dp.principal_investigator_id join os_departments dep on dep.identifier = usr.department_id ) t on (dp.identifier = t.dp_id) when matched then update set dp.institute_id = t.inst_id

changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.id: Update the requestor ID to PI if not specified
changeSet.sql: update catissue_order ordr join catissue_distribution_protocol dp on ordr.distribution_protocol_id = dp.identifier join catissue_user u on u.identifier = dp.principal_investigator_id set ordr.requester_id = u.identifier where ordr.requester_id is null

changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.id: Update the requestor ID to PI if not specified
changeSet.sql: merge into catissue_order ordr using ( select ordr.identifier as order_id, usr.identifier as user_id from catissue_order ordr join catissue_distribution_protocol dp on ordr.distribution_protocol_id = dp.identifier join catissue_user usr on usr.identifier = dp.principal_investigator_id ) t on (ordr.identifier = t.order_id) when matched then update set ordr.requester_id = t.user_id

changeSet.author: vratnaparkhi
changeSet.sql:
insert into os_orders ( identifier, name, requester_id, creation_date, execution_date, status, activity_status, site_id, distribution_protocol_id, distributor_id, comments)
select distribution.identifier as identifier, case when orders.name is null then concat('',distribution.event_timestamp) else substr(orders.name, 1, 255) end as name, case when orders.requester_id is null then distribution.user_id else orders.requester_id end as requester_id, case when orders.requested_date is null then distribution.event_timestamp else orders.requested_date end as requested_date, distribution.event_timestamp as execution_date, case when orders.status in ('Completed') then 'EXECUTED' else 'PENDING' end as status, distribution.activity_status as activity_status, distribution.to_site_id as site_id, case when distribution.distribution_protocol_id is null then (select min(identifier) from catissue_distribution_protocol where activity_status != 'Disabled') else distribution.distribution_protocol_id end as distribution_protocol_id, distribution.user_id as distributor_id, substr(orders.comments, 1, 255) as comments from catissue_distribution distribution left join catissue_order orders on distribution.order_id = orders.identifier

insert into os_order_items ( identifier, order_id, quantity, specimen_id, status)
select dep.identifier as identifier, dep.distribution_id as order_id, dep.distributed_quantity as quantity, fre.object_id as specimen_id, 'DISTRIBUTED' as status from catissue_distri_event_param dep inner join catissue_distribution distribution on distribution.identifier = dep.distribution_id inner join catissue_order ordr on ordr.identifier = distribution.order_id inner join catissue_form_record_entry fre on fre.record_id = dep.identifier inner join catissue_form_context fctxt on fre.form_ctxt_id = fctxt.identifier inner join dyextn_containers dc on fctxt.container_id = dc.identifier where dc.name = 'SpecimenDistributedEvent'
